SENT.plain: This is a report of a case history of a child with cerebral Moyamoya disease and gradual development of systemic hypertension
Sodium depletion combined with enalapril induced renal failure
A bilateral renal artery stenosis was found
Percutaneous transluminal angioplasty was not successful and was followed by autotransplantation of both kidneys
Histopathological examination of the renal arteries revealed intimal hyperplasia
